DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Boccob
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Uncaring, Lord of All Magics

Alignment: Neutral
Portfolio: Magic, arcane knowledge, balance, foresight
Worshippers: Wizards, sorcerers, sages, and those who seek knowledge or practice magic
Domains: Knowledge, Magic, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Quarterstaff

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Corellon Larethian
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Creator of the Elves, The Protector

Alignment: Chaotic Good
Portfolio: Elves, magic, music, arts, crafts, war, poetry
Worshippers: Elves, half-elves, bards, artists, warriors
Domains: Chaos, Good, Magic, Protection, War
Favored Weapon: Longsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Ehlonna
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Ehlonna of the Forests

Alignment: Neutral Good
Portfolio: Forests, woodlands, flora, fauna, fertility
Worshippers: Rangers, druids, hunters, elves, woodsmen
Domains: Animal, Good, Plant, Sun
Favored Weapon: Longbow

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Erythnul
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Many, God of Slaughter

Alignment: Chaotic Evil
Portfolio: Malice, envy, slaughter, panic, ugliness
Worshippers: Evil warriors, bandits, sadists, those who revel in destruction
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Trickery, War
Favored Weapon: Morningstar

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Fharlanghn
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Dweller on the Horizon, The Wanderer

Alignment: Neutral
Portfolio: Horizons, distance, travel, roads
Worshippers: Travelers, explorers, merchants, adventurers
Domains: Luck, Protection, Travel
Favored Weapon: Quarterstaff

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Garl Glittergold
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Watchful Protector, The Joker

Alignment: Neutral Good
Portfolio: Gnomes, humor, wit, gemcutting, protection, trickery
Worshippers: Gnomes, jesters, jewelers, pranksters
Domains: Good, Protection, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Battleaxe

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Gruumsh
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
One-Eye, He Who Never Sleeps

Alignment: Chaotic Evil
Portfolio: Orcs, war, territory, strength
Worshippers: Orcs and half-orcs
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Strength, War
Favored Weapon: Spear

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Heironeous
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Invincible, The Valorous Knight

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Valor, chivalry, justice, honor, war, daring
Worshippers: Paladins, good fighters and warriors, guards, leaders
Domains: Good, Law, War
Favored Weapon: Longsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Hextor
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Scourge of Battle, Champion of Evil

Alignment: Lawful Evil
Portfolio: War, discord, massacre, conflict, fitness, tyranny
Worshippers: Evil fighters and monks, tyrants, conquerors
Domains: Destruction, Evil, Law, War
Favored Weapon: Flail

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Kord
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Brawler, The Mighty

Alignment: Chaotic Good
Portfolio: Strength, athletics, sports, brawling, courage
Worshippers: Barbarians, fighters, athletes, and those who value strength
Domains: Chaos, Good, Luck, Strength
Favored Weapon: Greatsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Moradin
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Soul Forger, Dwarffather

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Dwarves, creation, smithing, protection, metalcraft, stonework
Worshippers: Dwarves, smiths, engineers, architects
Domains: Earth, Good, Law, Protection
Favored Weapon: Warhammer

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Nerull
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Reaper, Foe of All Good

Alignment: Neutral Evil
Portfolio: Death, darkness, murder, the underworld
Worshippers: Assassins, necromancers, evil cultists, those who profit from death
Domains: Death, Evil, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Scythe

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Obad-Hai
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Shalm, The Hidden Woodcaster

Alignment: Neutral
Portfolio: Nature, woodlands, freedom, hunting, beasts
Worshippers: Druids, rangers, hunters, barbarians, those who live in harmony with nature
Domains: Air, Animal, Earth, Fire, Plant, Water
Favored Weapon: Quarterstaff

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Olidammara
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Laughing Rogue

Alignment: Chaotic Neutral
Portfolio: Music, revels, wine, rogues, humor, tricks
Worshippers: Rogues, bards, minstrels, hedonists, jesters
Domains: Chaos, Luck, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Rapier

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Pelor
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Sun Father, The Shining One

Alignment: Neutral Good
Portfolio: Sun, light, strength, healing, life
Worshippers: Healers, protectors, common folk, those who fight against darkness and undeath
Domains: Good, Healing, Strength, Sun
Favored Weapon: Mace (heavy or light)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: St. Cuthbert
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
St. Cuthbert of the Cudgel

Alignment: Lawful Neutral
Portfolio: Common sense, wisdom, zeal, honesty, truth, discipline
Worshippers: Judges, guards, common folk who value order and truth
Domains: Destruction, Law, Protection, Strength
Favored Weapon: Mace (heavy or light)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Vecna
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Maimed Lord, The Whispered One

Alignment: Neutral Evil
Portfolio: Undead, evil secrets, necromancy, forbidden knowledge
Worshippers: Evil necromancers, power-hungry mages, seekers of forbidden lore
Domains: Evil, Knowledge, Magic
Favored Weapon: Dagger

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Wee Jas
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Ruby Sorceress, Stern Lady

Alignment: Lawful Neutral
Portfolio: Magic, death, vanity, law, order in death
Worshippers: Wizards, necromancers, judges, those who respect order and the finality of death
Domains: Death, Law, Magic
Favored Weapon: Dagger

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Yondalla
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Protector and Provider, The Nurturing Matriarch

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Halflings, protection, bounty, family, tradition
Worshippers: Halflings, community leaders, protectors
Domains: Good, Law, Protection
Favored Weapon: Short sword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Bane
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Black Lord, Lord of Darkness

Alignment: Lawful Evil
Portfolio: Strife, hatred, tyranny, fear
Worshippers: Tyrants, conquerors, evil warriors, those who seek to dominate others
Domains: Evil, Destruction, Hatred, Law, Tyranny
Favored Weapon: Morningstar

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Chauntea
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Great Mother, Grain Goddess

Alignment: Neutral Good
Portfolio: Agriculture, plants cultivated by humans, farmers, gardeners, summer
Worshippers: Farmers, gardeners, common folk
Domains: Earth, Good, Plant, Protection, Renewal
Favored Weapon: Scythe

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Cyric
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Prince of Lies, The Dark Sun

Alignment: Chaotic Evil
Portfolio: Murder, lies, intrigue, deception, illusion
Worshippers: Assassins, liars, madmen, those who thrive on chaos and deceit
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Illusion, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Longsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Helm
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Vigilant One, The Watcher

Alignment: Lawful Neutral
Portfolio: Guardians, protectors, protection, vigilance
Worshippers: Guards, sentinels, those who protect others
Domains: Law, Planning, Protection, Strength
Favored Weapon: Bastard sword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Ilmater
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Crying God, The Rack-Broken Lord

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Endurance, suffering, martyrdom, perseverance
Worshippers: The oppressed, the persecuted, the poor, monks
Domains: Good, Healing, Law, Strength, Suffering
Favored Weapon: Unarmed strike

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Kelemvor
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Lord of the Dead, Judge of the Damned

Alignment: Lawful Neutral
Portfolio: Death, the dead
Worshippers: Those who seek a peaceful passing, mourners, undertakers
Domains: Death, Fate, Law, Protection, Travel
Favored Weapon: Bastard sword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Lathander
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Morninglord, Inspiration's Dawn

Alignment: Neutral Good
Portfolio: Spring, dawn, birth, renewal, creativity, youth, vitality, athletics
Worshippers: Artists, athletes, commoners, merchants, the young
Domains: Good, Nobility, Protection, Renewal, Strength, Sun
Favored Weapon: Mace (heavy or light)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Mystra
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Mother of All Magic, The Lady of Mysteries

Alignment: Neutral Good
Portfolio: Magic, spells, the Weave
Worshippers: Wizards, sorcerers, bards, all users of magic
Domains: Good, Illusion, Knowledge, Magic, Rune, Spell
Favored Weapon: Quarterstaff

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Oghma
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Lord of Knowledge, The Binder

Alignment: Neutral
Portfolio: Knowledge, invention, inspiration, bards
Worshippers: Sages, scholars, inventors, bards, loremasters
Domains: Charm, Knowledge, Luck, Travel, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Longsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Sel√ªne
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Our Lady of Silver, Moonmaiden

Alignment: Chaotic Good
Portfolio: Moon, stars, navigation, navigators, wanderers, questers, good and neutral lycanthropes
Worshippers: Sailors, travelers, good lycanthropes, those who seek guidance or protection at night
Domains: Chaos, Good, Moon, Protection, Travel
Favored Weapon: Heavy mace

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Shar
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Mistress of the Night, Lady of Loss

Alignment: Neutral Evil
Portfolio: Dark, night, loss, forgetfulness, secrets, caverns, dungeons, the Underdark
Worshippers: Those who dwell in darkness, nihilists, those who have suffered great loss
Domains: Cavern, Darkness, Evil, Knowledge
Favored Weapon: Chakram (treat as shuriken)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Silvanus
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Oak Father, Forest Father

Alignment: Neutral
Portfolio: Wild nature, druids
Worshippers: Druids, rangers, those who live in wild, untamed lands
Domains: Animal, Plant, Protection, Renewal, Water
Favored Weapon: Greatclub

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Sune
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Lady Firehair, The Lady of Love

Alignment: Chaotic Good
Portfolio: Beauty, love, passion
Worshippers: Lovers, artists, hedonists, those who appreciate beauty
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Good, Protection
Favored Weapon: Whip

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Talos
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Stormlord, The Destroyer

Alignment: Chaotic Evil
Portfolio: Storms, destruction, rebellion, conflagrations, earthquakes, vortices
Worshippers: Those who revel in destruction, barbarians, raiders
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Fire, Storm
Favored Weapon: Spear

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Tempus
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Lord of Battles, Foehammer

Alignment: Neutral
Portfolio: War, battle, warriors
Worshippers: Fighters, barbarians, rangers, soldiers, mercenaries
Domains: Protection, Strength, War
Favored Weapon: Battleaxe

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Torm
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The True, The Loyal Fury

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Duty, loyalty, obedience, paladins
Worshippers: Paladins, guards, those who serve a cause or master
Domains: Good, Healing, Law, Protection, Strength
Favored Weapon: Greatsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Tymora
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Lady Luck, Our Smiling Lady

Alignment: Chaotic Good
Portfolio: Good fortune, skill, victory, adventurers
Worshippers: Adventurers, gamblers, risk-takers
Domains: Chaos, Good, Luck, Protection, Travel
Favored Weapon: Shuriken

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Tyr
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Maimed God, The Even-Handed

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Justice
Worshippers: Judges, lawyers, paladins, those who seek justice
Domains: Good, Knowledge, Law, Retribution, War
Favored Weapon: Longsword

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Umberlee
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Bitch Queen, Queen of the Deeps

Alignment: Chaotic Evil
Portfolio: Oceans, currents, waves, sea winds
Worshippers: Sailors, pirates, those who live by the sea and fear its wrath
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Ocean, Storm, Water
Favored Weapon: Trident

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Lolth
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Queen of Spiders, Queen of the Demonweb Pits

Alignment: Chaotic Evil
Portfolio: Drow, spiders, evil, darkness, chaos
Worshippers: Drow, some evil arcanists
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Drow, Evil, Spider, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Whip (looks like a spider's leg, or a scourge with spider-shaped-or-ended tails)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Tiamat
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Chromatic Dragon, Dragon Queen

Alignment: Lawful Evil
Portfolio: Evil dragons, conquest, greed, vengeance
Worshippers: Evil dragons, cultists who seek power through dragons
Domains: Destruction, Evil, Law, Scalykind, Trickery, Tyranny
Favored Weapon: Heavy pick (her head spike)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Bahamut
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Platinum Dragon, King of Good Dragons

Alignment: Lawful Good
Portfolio: Good dragons, wisdom, wind, justice, protection
Worshippers: Good dragons, those who seek justice and protection
Domains: Air, Good, Luck, Nobility, Protection, Storm
Favored Weapon: Longsword (bite)

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Kurtulmak
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
Steelscale, The Cunning

Alignment: Lawful Evil
Portfolio: Kobolds, traps, mining
Worshippers: Kobolds
Domains: Earth, Evil, Law, Luck, Trickery
Favored Weapon: Heavy pick

DND_DEITIES_DATA.label: Maglubiyet
DND_DEITIES_DATA.description:
The Mighty One, The Battle Lord

Alignment: Lawful Evil
Portfolio: Goblins, hobgoblins, war, rulership
Worshippers: Goblins, hobgoblins, and other goblinoids
Domains: Destruction, Evil, Law, Trickery, War
Favored Weapon: Battleaxe
